title.english: Cute High Earth Defense Club LOVE!

description:
Teenage boys are notoriously lazy, and the members of Binan High School's Earth Defense Club are no exception. Their definition of “earth defense” is bumming around all day at the local bathhouse. But when a pink wombat appears out of thin air and begs the boys to help him save the planet, even the idlest high schoolers jump to action. Watch the magical boys transform and save the earth with the power of LOVE!

(Source: FUNimation)

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.name: Cute Boys Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around male characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Super Power
tags.description: Prominently features characters with special abilities that allow them to do what would normally be physically or logically impossible.

tags.name: Primarily Male Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of male characters.

tags.name: Henshin
tags.description: Prominently features character or costume transformations which often grant special abilities.

tags.name: Parody
tags.description: Features deliberate exaggeration of popular tropes or a particular genre to comedic effect.

tags.name: Episodic
tags.description: Features story arcs that are loosely tied or lack an overarching plot.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: School Club
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a school club scene.

tags.name: Nudity
tags.description: Features a character wearing no clothing or exposing intimate body parts.

node.description: **Michiko Yokote** is a Japanese scriptwriter. She is the pupil of [Kazunori Itou](https://anilist.co/staff/97941).

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/高橋ナツコ)

_Note: Not to be confused with the [animator](https://anilist.co/staff/193091/)._
In March 2010, she graduated from Tokyo Animation College.
In March 2010, she graduated from Tokyo Animation College.

**Height:** 174 cm

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/shirai_universe) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCdrKW91dH2sN60Huk8pBMqg)

On September 12, 2022, it was revealed that he is married to the writer and former idol [Mariru Harada](https://anilist.co/staff/150544/Mariru-Harada), with whom he has a child.

__Height:__ 160.3cm
__Agency:__ Amuleto

[Website](https://kazutomi.jp) | [Profile (Amuleto)](https://amuleto.jp/talents/yamamotokazutomi.html) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kazutomi_tweet) | [Blog](http://blog.chel-sea.com/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCHKqnMCudotNBY-ND-MoDfw)

In 2013, he won Best Rookie Actor at the 7th Seiyu Awards alongside Nobunaga Shimazaki.

__Non-Anime Roles:__
Dahlia - Genshin Impact (VG)
Midare Toushirou - Touken Ranbu (VG)

**Height:** 176 cm (5'9)

[Website](https://www.toshikimasuda.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/ToshikiMasuda38) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/toshi.m38/) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCx47ourWgyHf3iAl77MYY0g/featured)

__Non-Anime Roles:__

- Rover - Wuthering Waves (VG)
- Masayoshi Tanimura - Yakuza 4 Remastered

__Height:__ 173 cm
__Hobbies:__ classic music appreciation, piano, guitar, singing

[Profile](https://www.artsvision.co.jp/talent/294/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/UmeuMeumE_Y) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yūichirō_Umehara) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/梅原裕一郎)

A voice actor affiliated with [Arts Vision](https://anilist.co/studio/6367).

He revealed on April 4th, 2024 that he has been married to his college classmate since 2016.

**Non-Anime Roles:**
- Alhaitham - Genshin Impact (VG)
- Leona Kingscholar - Disney Twisted-Wonderland (VG)

[Official Website](https://www.lantis.jp/nishiyamakoutaro/) | [Profile ](https://www.81produce.co.jp/dcms_plusdb/index.php/item?cell003=%E3%81%AA%E8%A1%8C&label=1&page=2&cell004=&name=%E8%A5%BF%E5%B1%B1%E3%80%80%E5%AE%8F%E5%A4%AA%E6%9C%97&id=98) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Koutarotaro)

Koutaro Nishiyama is a Japanese voice actor and singer. He is currently affiliated with 81 Produce. In 2018, he won the Best New Actor Award at the 12th Seiyu Awards.
